author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Immunogen Announces Positive Findings From Forward 2 Study Of Mirvetuximab Soravtansine Combination Regimens
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - ImmunoGen Inc:
* IMMUNOGEN ANNOUNCES POSITIVE FINDINGS FROM THE FORWARD II STUDY OF MIRVETUXIMAB SORAVTANSINE COMBINATION REGIMENS WITH AVASTINÂ® AND CARBOPLATIN IN OVARIAN CANCER
* IMMUNOGEN - UPDATED DATA FROM CARBOPLATIN DOSE-ESCALATION COHORT DEMONSTRATE INCREASED RESPONSE RATE AND DURABLE BENEFIT WITH LONGER-TERM FOLLOW UP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
